mapper.select: SELECT A.IDX as idx , A.TITLE as title , A.CONTENTS as contents , A.COUNT as count , A.WRITER as writer , A.INDATE as indate , B.USER_NAME as writerNm FROM TBL_BOARD A LEFT JOIN TBL_USER B ON A.WRITER = B.USER_ID WHERE A.IDX=#{idx}

SELECT A.IDX as idx , A.TITLE as title , A.CONTENTS as contents , IFNULL(A.COUNT,0) as count , A.WRITER as writer , A.INDATE as indate , B.USER_NAME as writerNm , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_REPLY X WHERE X.IDX=A.IDX) AS reply FROM TBL_BOARD A LEFT JOIN TBL_USER B ON A.WRITER = B.USER_ID WHERE 1=1
AND ( A.TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')) OR A.CONTENTS LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
ORDER BY A.IDX DESC
